Summary._: Northbound [A], [C] and [E] trains are running with delays because of signal problems at 34 St-Penn Station.

Description._: Northbound [A], [C] and [E] trains are running with delays because of signal problems at 34 St-Penn Station.

LongDescription:
Northbound [A], [C] and [E] trains are running with delays because of signal problems at 34 St-Penn Station.
Our crews are on the scene working to fix this ASAP. We'll keep you posted.

Summary._: Some Canarsie bound [L] trains end at Broadway Junction or Myrtle-Wyckoff Avs because of signal problems between Broadway Junction and Rockaway Pkwy.

Description._: Some Canarsie bound [L] trains end at Broadway Junction or Myrtle-Wyckoff Avs because of signal problems between Broadway Junction and Rockaway Pkwy.

LongDescription:
Some Canarsie bound [L] trains end at Broadway Junction or Myrtle-Wyckoff Avs. 
Expect delays in [L] train service in both directions.
This service change is because of signal problems between Broadway Junction and Canarsie-Rockaway Pkwy.

Summary._: STRUCTURAL IMPROVEMENTS  [7D] Express trains make local stops in both directions at 33, 40, 46, 52, 69 and 74 Sts

Description._: STRUCTURAL IMPROVEMENTS  [7D] Express trains make local stops in both directions at 33, 40, 46, 52, 69 and 74 Sts

LongDescription: <b><i>STRUCTURAL IMPROVEMENTS</i><br clear=left>[7D] Express trains make local stops in both directions at 33, 40, 46, 52, 69 and 74 Sts</b>Rush Hours, 6 AM to 10 AM<i> and</i> 2:45 PM to 10 PM, Mon to Fri, until Mar 9<br><br> Please allow additional travel time.<br><b><br>
